articleContentTranslated: Northug processes scandalous year in Christmas carol Norway's former cross-country skiing star Petter Northug has cast his turbulent year into a Christmas carol. â€œI wasn't a nice boy this year,â€ sums up the 34-year-old, who is being investigated for drug possession and driving too fast.
â€œI'm not a dream son. In life I stumble, but I get up again, â€Northug sings in front of a Christmas backdrop. ğŸ¶ Petters Jul ğŸ¶ God advent til dere alle â¤ï¸ğŸ„ğŸ… Spotify: https:

//spoti.fi/37hhsbRPosted by Petter Northug on Sunday, November 29, 2020 The two-time Olympic champion was stopped on the motorway at too high a speed in the summer. : The police subsequently found a small amount of cocaine in his apartment.
Northug admitted at a press conference that he had a serious drug problem. He is expected to be charged before Christmas.
